### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5), but it is not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at no specific position
No copper plate mine structure has been identified in the given execution logs.

### Copper cable factory at no specific position
No copper cable factory structure has been identified in the given execution logs.

### Boiler system at positions(x=1.5, y=1.0), (x=1.5, y=3.0), and (x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boilers at positions(x=1.5, y=1.0), (x=1.5, y=3.0), and (x=-24.5, y=32.0) with pipes connecting them, but all boilers are out of fuel.

### Offshore pump system at various positions
Consists of offshore pumps at positions(x=-7.5, y=25.5), (x=-18.5, y=27.5), (x=-16.5, y=26.5), (x=-13.5, y=26.5), (x=-3.5, y=27.5), (x=-1.5, y=28.5), (x=0.5, y=30.5), and (x=1.5, y=32.5) with some pumps working and others not working due to no fluid present in connections.

### Pipe groups at various positions
Consists of pipe groups with various fluid systems, including water, at positions(x=-5.5, y=-8.5), (x=3.5, y=-2.5), (x=-20.5, y=25.5), (x=-12.5, y=25.5), and (x=-5.5, y=25.5) with different statuses.

### Electricity group at various positions
Consists of an electricity group with id 82987 and poles at various positions, including (x=-28.5, y=33.5), (x=-39.5, y=34.5), and (x=-42.5, y=39.5), with a voltage of 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities
- Ensure that the entities to be connected are valid and exist on the map.
- Check that the pipe is correctly placed between the entities to be connected.

### Errors when inserting items into a boiler
- Make sure that the item to be inserted is available in the inventory.
- Check that the boiler is not out of fuel before inserting items.

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure that the entity to be retrieved exists on the map and is of the correct type.
- Check that the position of the entity is correct and within the map boundaries.

### Errors when offshore pumps are not working
- Check that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe and has a fluid present in its connections.
- Ensure that the offshore pump is not out of fluid or has a valid fluid box.

### Errors when boilers are out of fuel
- Make sure that the boiler has a valid fuel source and is not empty.
- Check that the fuel is correctly inserted into the boiler.
